title: Chris Taylor from PG. 99 & Pygmy Lush
itunes:title: Chris Taylor from PG. 99 & Pygmy Lush
description:
Episode 300 - LET’S PARTY! I can’t believe it’s been 300 episodes but here we are and thank you very much for listening and continuing to support this project. We have Chris Taylor hopping on the show this week. He is the vocalist for recently reunited and original “screamo” legends Page 99 (or otherwise known as Pg. 99). We dive deep into the intricacies of navigating the reunion show world, empathy and being intentionally unconventional. It’s a long one so settle in and enjoy the nuggets of wisdom that are contained within. Transfer files the right way, with WeTransfer The best way to take care of yourself is with HIMS. Get your first month for $5 and you’ll thank me later. Want a better night sleep? Try a Casper for 100 days and your life will change. DO IT UP If you want to get your marketing game ON POINT, sign up for this great class done by two previous guests of the show. I love it and you will too. Use our Amazon Affiliate Code to support the show! Visit our friends over at No Echo for great features on punk, hardcore and all things heavy.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
